paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses the effects of a CDC7 inhibitor on DNA damage recovery and mentions a BRCA2 variant, M784V, in the context of its potential implications for cancer treatment.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: PHTXS-13O has mutant BRCA2 at M784V, which is a variant of unknown significance.

functional_data.summary: The variant is mentioned in the context of its potential to induce BRCAness, leading to increased sensitivity to PARP inhibitors.

variants.additional_notes: The variant is described as a variant of unknown significance (VUS) and is part of a study involving combination treatments.
key_quotes: PHTXS-13O has mutant BRCA2 at M784V, which is a variant of unknown significance.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one BRCA2 variant was mentioned in the paper.
